nodes.text: Saujutta-Ok-Topii was a Pan-preneur businesswoman who was a marketing lieutenant for Trigdale Metallurgy, leading their marketing division during the height of the Galactic Empire. After the end of the Galactic Civil War, Trigdale abandoned their ties with many of the subdivisions of the company. Saujutta-Ok-Topii reformed her branch into Syndicate One, changing the company into an arms manufacturer. She also setup Executive Results to act as a front company to smuggle and distribute the weapons.
